English Translation: Zhen Shi-yin makes the Stone 's acquaintance in a dream

红楼梦原文: 贾雨村 风尘 怀 闺秀
English Translation: And Jia Yu-cun finds that poverty is not incompatible with romantic feelings

红楼梦原文: 看官 ： 你 道 此书 从 何 而 起 ？
English Translation: GENTLE READER , What , you may ask , was the origin of this book ?

红楼梦原文: — — 说来 虽 近 荒唐 ， 细玩 颇 有 趣味 。
English Translation: Though the answer to this question may at first seem to border on the absurd , reflection will show that there is a good deal more in it than meets the eye .

红楼梦原文: 却说 那 女 蜗氏 炼石补天 之 时 ， 于 大 荒山 无稽 崖 炼成 高 十二 丈 、 见方 二十四丈 大 的 顽石 三万 六千五百 零 一块 ， 那 蜗皇 只用 了 三万 六千五百 块 ， 单单 剩下 一块 未 用 ， 弃 在 青填峰 下 。
English Translation: Long ago , when the goddess Nii-wa was repairing the sky , she melted down a great quantity of rock and , on the Incredible Crags of the Great Fable Mountains , moulded the amalgam into thirty-six thousand , five hundred and one large building blocks , each measuring seventy-two feet by a hundred and forty-four feet square . She used thirty-six thousand five hundred of these blocks in the course of her building operations , leaving a single odd block unused , which lay , all on its own , at the foot of Greensickness Peak in the aforementioned mountains .

红楼梦原文: 谁知 此 石 自经 锻炼 之后 ， 灵性 已 通 ， 自去 自来 ， 可大可小 ， 因见 众石俱得补天 ， 独 自己 无才 ， 不得 入选 ， 遂 自怨 自愧 ， 日夜 悲哀 。
English Translation: Now this block of stone , having undergone the melting and moulding of a goddess , possessed magic powers . It could move about at will and could grow or shrink to any size it wanted . Observing that all the other blocks had been used for celestial repairs and that it was the only one to have been rejected as unworthy , it became filled with shame and resentment and passed its days in sorrow and lamentation .

红楼梦原文: 一日 ， 正当 嗟悼 之际 ， 俄 见 一 僧 一道 ， 远远 而 来 ， 生得 骨格 不凡 ， 丰神 迥异 ， 来到 这 青埂峰 下 ， 席地 坐谈 。
English Translation: One day , in the midst of its lamentings , it saw a monk and a Taoist approaching from a great distance , each of them remarkable for certain eccentricities of manner and appearance .

红楼梦原文: 见 着 这块 鲜莹 明洁 的 石头 ， 且 又 缩成 扇坠 一般 ， 甚 属 可爱 ；
English Translation: When they arrived at the foot of Greensickness Peak , they sat down on the ground and began to talk .

红楼梦原文: 那僧托 于 掌上 ， 笑 道 ： “ 形体 倒 也 是 个 灵物 了 ！
English Translation: The monk , catching sight of a lustrous , translucent stone - it was in fact the rejected building block which had now shrunk itself to the size of a fan-pendant and looked very attractive in its new shape - took it up on the palm of his hand and addressed it with a smile : ' Ha , I see you have magical properties !

红楼梦原文: 只是 没有 实在 的 好处 ， 须 得 再 镌 上 几个 字 ， 使 人人 见 了 便 知 你 是 件 奇物 ， 然后 携 你 到 那 昌明 隆盛 之 邦 、 诗礼 簪缨 之族 、 花柳 繁华 地 、 温柔 富贵 乡 那里 去 走一遭 。 ”
English Translation: But nothing to recommend you . I shall have to cut a few words on you so that anyone seeing you will know at once that you are something special . After that I shall take you to a certain brilliant successful poetical cultivated aristocratic elegant delectable luxurious opulent locality on a little trip .

红楼梦原文: 石头 听 了 大喜 ， 因 问 ： “ 不知 可 镌 何 字 ？
English Translation: The stone was delighted . ' What words will you cut ?

红楼梦原文: 携到 何方 ？
English Translation: Where is this place you will take me to ?

红楼梦原文: 望 乞 明示 。 ”
English Translation: I beg to be enlightened . '

红楼梦原文: 那僧笑 道 ： “ 你 且莫 问 ， 日后 自然 明白 。 ”
English Translation: ' Do not ask , replied the monk with a laugh . ' You will know soon enough when the time comes . '

红楼梦原文: 说 毕 ， 便 袖 了 ， 同 那道人 飘然 而 去 ， 竟 不知 投向 何方 。
English Translation: And with that he slipped the stone into his sleeve and set oft ' at a great pace with the Taoist . But where they both went to I have no idea .

红楼梦原文: 又 不知 过 了 几世 几 劫 ， 因 有个 空空 道人 访道 求仙 ， 从 这 大 荒山 无稽 崖 青埂峰 下 经过 ， 忽 见 一块 大石 ， 上面 字迹 分明 ， 编述 历历 ；
English Translation: Countless aeons went by and a certain Taoist called Vanitas in quest of the secret of immortality chanced to be passing below that same Greensickness Peak in the Incredible Crags of the Great Fable Mountains when he caught sight of a large stone standing there , on which the characters of a long inscription were clearly discernible .

红楼梦原文: 空空 道人 乃 从头 一 看 ， 原来 是 无 才 补 天 、 幻形 入世 、 被 那 茫茫 大士 渺渺 真人 携入 红尘 、 引登 彼岸 的 一块 顽石 ：
English Translation: Vanitas read the inscription through from beginning to end and learned that this was a once lifeless stone block which had been found unworthy to repair the sky , but which had magically transformed its shape and been taken down by the Buddhist mahasattva Impervioso and the Taoist illuminate Mysterioso into the world of mortals , where it had lived out the life of a man before finally attaining nirvana and returning to the other shore .

红楼梦原文: 上面 叙 着 堕落 之 乡 ， 投胎 之 处 ， 以及 家庭 琐事 ， 闺阁 闲情 ， 诗词 谜语 ， 倒 还 全备 。
English Translation: The inscription named the country where it had been born , and went into considerable detail about its domestic life , youthful amours , and even the verses , mottoes and riddles it had written .

红楼梦原文: 只是 朝代 年纪 ， 失落 无考 。
English Translation: All it lacked was the authentication of a dynasty and date .

红楼梦原文: 后面 又 有 一 偈 云 ：
English Translation: On the back of the stone was inscribed the following quatrain :

红楼梦原文: 无才 可去 补 苍天 ，
English Translation: Found unfit to repair the azure sky

红楼梦原文: 枉入 红尘 若 许年 ；
English Translation: Long years a foolish mortal man was I.

红楼梦原文: 此 系 身前 身后事 ，
English Translation: My life in both worlds on this stone is writ :

红楼梦原文: 倩 谁 记去 作奇 传 ？
English Translation: Pray who will copy out and publish it ?

红楼梦原文: 空空 道人 看 了 一回 ， 晓得 这 石头 有些 来历 ， 遂 向 石头 说道 ： “ 石兄 ， 你 这 一段 故事 ， 据 你 自己 说来 ， 有些 趣味 ， 故 镌写 在 此 ， 意欲 闻世 传奇 ；
English Translation: From his reading of the inscription Vanitas realized that this was a stone of some consequence . Accordingly he addressed himself to it in the following manner : ' Brother Stone , according to what you yourself seem to imply in these verses , this story of yours contains matter of sufficient interest to merit publication and has been carved here with that end in view .

红楼梦原文: 据 我 看来 ， 第一件 ， 无 朝代 年纪 可 考 ， 第二件 ， 并 无 大贤 大忠 、 理 朝廷 、 治 风俗 的 善政 ， 其中 只不过 几个 异样 女子 ， 或 情 或 痴 ， 或 小 才 微善 ， 我 纵然 抄去 ， 也 算不得 一种 奇书 。 ”
English Translation: But as far as I can see ( a ) it has no discoverable dynastic period , and ( b ) it contains no examples of moral grandeur among its characters - no statesmanship , no social message of any kind . All I can find in it , in fact , are a number of females , conspicuous , if at all , only for their passion or folly or for some trifling talent or insignificant virtue . Even if I were to copy all this out , I can not see that it would make a very remarkable book . '

红楼梦原文: 石头 果然 答道 ： “ 我 师 何必 太痴 ！
English Translation: ' Come , your reverence , ' said the stone ( for Vanitas had been correct in assuming that it could speak ) ' must you be so obtuse ?

红楼梦原文: 我 想 历来 野史 的 朝代 ， 无非 假借 ‘ 汉 ’ ‘ 唐 ’ 的 名色 ；
English Translation: All the romances ever written have an artificial period setting - Han or Tang for the most part .

红楼梦原文: 莫如 我 这 石头 所记 ， 不 借此 套 ， 只 按 自己 的 事体 情理 ， 反倒 新鲜 别致 。
English Translation: In refusing to make use of that stale old convention and telling my Story of the Stone exactly as it occurred , it seems to me that , far from depriving it of anything , I have given it a freshness these other books do not have .

红楼梦原文: 况且 那 野史 中 ， 或 讪谤 君相 ， 或 贬 人 妻女 ， 奸淫 凶恶 ， 不可胜数 ， 更 有 一种 风月 笔墨 ， 其 淫秽 污臭 ， 最易 坏人 子弟 。
English Translation: ' Your so-called " historical romances " , consisting , as they do , of scandalous anecdotes about statesmen and emperors of bygone days and scabrous attacks on the reputations of long-dead gentlewomen , contain more wickedness and immorality than I care to mention . Still worse is the " erotic novel " , by whose filthy obscenities our young folk are all too easily corrupted .

红楼梦原文: 至于 才子佳人 等 书 ， 则 又 开口 ‘ 文君 ’ ， 满篇 ‘ 子建 ’ ， 千部一腔 ， 千人一面 ， 且 终 不能不 涉淫 滥 。
English Translation: And the " boudoir romances " , those dreary stereotypes with their volume after volume all pitched on the same note and their different characters undistinguishable except by name ( all those ideally beautiful young ladies and ideally eligible young bachelors ) - even they seem unable to avoid descending sooner or later into indecency .

红楼梦原文: — — 在 作者 不过 要 写出 自己 的 两首 情诗 艳 赋来 ， 故假 捏出 男女 二人 名姓 ， 又 必旁添 一小 人 拨乱 其间 ， 如 戏 中 的 小丑 一般 。
English Translation: ' The trouble with this last kind of romance is that it only gets written in the first place because the author requires a framework in which to show off his love-poems . He goes about constructing this framework quite mechanically , beginning with the names of his pair of young lovers and invariably adding a third character , a servant or the like , to make mischief between them , like the chou in a comedy .

红楼梦原文: 更 可厌 者 ， ‘ 之乎者也 ’ ， 非理 即 文 ， 大 不 近情 ， 自相矛盾 ：
English Translation: ' What makes these romances even more detestable is the stilted , bombastic language - inanities dressed in pompous rhetoric , remote alike from nature and common sense and teeming with the grossest absurdities .

红楼梦原文: 竟 不如 我 这 半世 亲见亲闻 的 几个 女子 ， 虽 不敢 说 强似 前 代书 中 所有 之 人 ， 但 观 其 事迹 原委 ， 亦可 消愁 破闷 ；
English Translation: ' Surely my ' number of females ' , whom I spent half a lifetime studying with my own eyes and ears , are preferable to this kind of stuff ? I do not claim that they are better people than the ones who appear in books written before my time ; I am only saying that the contemplation of their actions and motives may prove a more effective antidote to boredom and melancholy .

红楼梦原文: 至于 几首 歪诗 ， 也 可以 喷饭 供酒 ；
English Translation: And even the inelegant verses with which my story is interlarded could serve to entertain and amuse on those convivial occasions when rhymes and riddles are in demand .

红楼梦原文: 其间 离合悲欢 ， 兴衰 际遇 ， 俱 是 按迹循踪 ， 不敢 稍加 穿凿 ， 至 失 其 真 。
English Translation: ' All that my story narrates , the meetings and partings , the joys and sorrows , the ups and downs of fortune , are recorded exactly as they happened . I have not dared to add the tiniest bit of touching-up , for fear of losing the true picture .

红楼梦原文: 只 愿 世人 当 那 醉 余 睡醒 之 时 ， 或 避事 消愁 之际 ， 把 此一 玩 ， 不 但是 洗 旧 翻新 ， 却 也 省 了 些 寿命 筋力 ， 不 更 去 谋虚逐妄 了 。
English Translation: ' My only wish is that men in the world below may sometimes pick up this tale when they are recovering from sleep or drunkenness , or when they wish to escape from business worries or a fit of the dumps , and in doing so find not only mental refreshment but even perhaps , if they will heed its lesson and abandon their vain and frivolous pursuits , some small arrest in the deterioration of their vital forces .

红楼梦原文: 我 师意 为 如何 ？ ”
English Translation: What does your reverence say to that ? '

红楼梦原文: 空空 道人 听 如此 说 ， 思忖 半晌 ， 将 这 《 石头记 》 再 检阅 一遍 ， 因见 上面 大旨 不过 谈情 ， 亦 只是 实录 其 事 ， 绝无 伤 时 诲淫 之病 ， 方 从头至尾 抄写 回来 ， 闻世 传奇 。
English Translation: For a long time Vanitas stood lost in thought , pondering this speech . He then subjected the Story of the Stone to a careful second reading . He could see that its main theme was love ; that it consisted quite simply of a true record of real events ; and that it was entirely free from any tendency to deprave and corrupt .

红楼梦原文: 从此 空空 道人 因 空见色 ， 由 色 生情 ， 传情 入色 ， 自色 悟空 ， 遂 改名 情僧 ， 改 《 石头记 》 为 《 情僧 录 》 。
English Translation: He therefore copied it all out from beginning to end and took it back with him to look for a publisher . As a consequence of all this , Vanitas , starting off in the Void ( which is Truth ) came to the contemplation of Form ( which is Illusion ) ; and from Form engendered Passion ; and by communicating Passion , entered again into Form ; and from Form awoke to the Void ( which is Truth ) . He therefore changed his name from Vanitas to Brother Amor , or the Passionate Monk , ( because he had approached Truth by way of Passion ) , and changed the title of the book from The Story of the Stone to The Tale of Brother Amor .

红楼梦原文: 东鲁 孔梅 溪题 日 《 风月 宝鉴 》 。
English Translation: Old Kong Mei-xi from the homeland of Confucius called the book 4 Mirror for the Romantic .

English Translation: Wu Yu-feng called it 4 Dream of Golden Days .

English Translation: Cao Xueqin in his Nostalgia Studio worked on it for ten years , in the course of which he rewrote it no less than five times , dividing it into chapters , composing chapter headings , renaming it The Twelve Beauties of Jinling , and adding an introductory quatrain .

English Translation: Red Inkstone restored the original title when he recopied the book and added his second set of annotations to it .

红楼梦原文: 当日 地陷 东南 ， 这 东南 有个 姑苏 城 ， 城中 阊 门 ， 最 是 红尘 中 一二 等 富贵 风流 之 地 。
English Translation: Long , long ago the world was tilted downwards towards the south-east ; and in that lower-lying south-easterly part of the earth there is a city called Soochow ; and in Soochow the district around the Chang-men Gate is reckoned one of the two or three wealthiest and most fashionable quarters in the world of men .

红楼梦原文: 这 阊 门外 有个 十里 街 ， 街内 有个 仁清巷 ， 巷内 有个 古庙 ， 因 地方 狭窄 ， 人 皆 呼作 “ 葫芦 庙 ” 。
English Translation: Outside the Chang-men Gate is a wide thorough-fare called Worldly Way ; and somewhere off Worldly Way is an area called Carnal Lane . There is an old temple in the Carnal Lane area which , because of the way it is bottled up inside a narrow cul-de-sac , is referred to locally as Bottle-gourd Temple .

红楼梦原文: 庙 旁 住 着 一家 乡宦 ， 姓 甄 名费 ， 字士 隐 ； 嫡妻 封氏 ， 性情 贤淑 ， 深 明礼义 ， 家中 虽不甚 富贵 ， 然 本地 也 推 他 为 望族 了 。
English Translation: Next door to Bottle-gourd Temple lived a gentleman of private means called Zhen Shi-yin and his wife Feng-shi , a kind , good woman with a profound sense of decency and decorum . The household was not a particularly wealthy one , but they were nevertheless looked up to by all and sundry as the leading family in the neighbourhood .

红楼梦原文: 因 这 甄士隐 禀性 恬淡 ， 不 以 功名 为 念 ， 每日 只以 观 花种 竹 、 酌酒 吟诗 为 乐 ， 倒 是 神仙 一流 人物 ； 只是 一件 不足 ： 年过半百 ， 膝下 无儿 ； 只有 一 女 ， 乳名 英莲 ， 年 方 三岁 。
English Translation: Zhen Shi-yin himself was by nature a quiet and totally unambitious person . He devoted his time to his garden and to the pleasures of wine and poetry . Except for a single flaw , his existence could , indeed , have been described as an idyllic one . The flaw was that , although already past fifty , he had no son , only a little girl , just two years old , whose name was Ying-lian .

红楼梦原文: 一日 炎夏 永昼 ， 士隐 于 书房 闲坐 ， 手 倦 抛 书 ， 伏 几 盹 睡 ， 不觉 蒙胧 中 走 至 一处 ， 不辨 是 何 地方 。 忽 见 那 厢 来 了 一 僧 一道 ， 且 行 且 谈 ， 只 听 道人 问道 ： “ 你 携 了 此物 ， 意欲 何往 ？ ”
English Translation: Once , during the tedium of a burning summer 's day , Shi-yin was sitting idly in his study . The book had slipped from his nerveless grasp and his head had nodded down onto the desk in a doze . While in this drowsy state he seemed to drift off to some place he could not identify , where he became aware of a monk and a Taoist walking along and talking as they went . ' Where do you intend to take that thing you are carrying ? ' the Taoist was asking .

红楼梦原文: 那僧笑 道 ： “ 你 放心 ！
English Translation: ' Do not you worry about him ! ' replied the monk with a laugh .

红楼梦原文: 如今 现有 一段 风流 公案 ， 正 该 了结 ， 这 一干 风流 冤家 尚未 投胎 入世 ， 趁此机会 ， 就 将 此物 夹带 于 中 ， 使 他 去 经历 经历 。 ”
English Translation: ' There is a batch of lovesick souls awaiting incarnation in the world below whose fate is due to be decided this very day . I intend to take advantage of this opportunity to slip our little friend in amongst them and let him have a taste of human life along with the rest .

English Translation: ' Well , well , so another lot of these amorous wretches is about to enter the vale of tears , ' said the Taoist . ' How did all this begin ?

English Translation: And where are the souls to be reborn ? '

English Translation: ' You will laugh when I tell you , ' said the monk .

红楼梦原文: 只 因 当年 这个 石头 ， 蜗皇 未 用 ， 自己 却 也 落得 逍遥自在 ， 各处 去 游玩 ， 一日 来到 警幻 仙子 处 ， 那 仙子 知 他 有些 来历 ， 因 留 他 在 赤霞 宫中 ， 名 他 为 赤霞宫 神瑛侍者 。
English Translation: ' ' When this stone was left unused by the goddess , he found himself at a loose end and took to wandering about all over the place for want of better to do , until one day his wanderings took him to the place where the fairy Disenchantment lives . 红楼梦原文: 他 却常 在 西方 灵 河岸 上 行走 ， 看见 那灵 河岸 上 三生石 畔 有 棵 ， 绛 珠 仙草 二十分 娇娜 可爱 ， 遂 日 以 甘露 灌溉 ， 这 ‘ 绛 珠草 ’ 始得 久 延 岁月 。

红楼梦原文: 春梅 绽 雪 ；
English Translation: In plum-trees flowering in the snow ;

红楼梦原文: 其 洁 若何 ：
English Translation: Her chastity I shall recall

红楼梦原文: 秋蕙 披 霜 。
English Translation: In orchids white at first frost-fall ;

红楼梦原文: 其 静 若何 ：
English Translation: Her tranquil nature will prevail ,

红楼梦原文: 松生 空谷 ；
English Translation: Constant as lone pine in an empty vale ;

红楼梦原文: 其 艳 若何 ：
English Translation: Her loveliness as dazzled make

红楼梦原文: 霞 映 澄塘 。
English Translation: As sunset gilding a pellucid lake ;

红楼梦原文: 其 文 若何 ：
English Translation: Her glittering elegance I can compare

红楼梦原文: 龙游曲沼 ；
English Translation: With dragons in an ornamental mere ;

红楼梦原文: 其 神 若何 ：
English Translation: Her dreamy soulfulness most seems

红楼梦原文: 月 射 寒江 。
English Translation: Like wintry waters in the moon 's cold beams .

红楼梦原文: — — 远 惭 西子 ， 近 愧 王 嫱 。
English Translation: The beauties of days gone by by her beauty are all abashed .

红楼梦原文: 生于 孰 地 ？ 降 自 何方 ？
English Translation: Where was she born , and from whence descended ?

红楼梦原文: 若非 宴 罢 归来 ， 瑶池 不二 ；
English Translation: Immortal I judge her , fresh come from fairy feastings by the Jasper Pool ,

红楼梦原文: 定应 吹箫 引 去 ， 紫府 无双 者 也 。
English Translation: Or from fluting in starry halls , some heavenly concert ended .

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 见 是 一个 仙姑 ， 喜 的 忙 来 作揖 ， 笑 问道 ： “ 神仙姐姐 ， 不知 从 那里 来 ， 如今 要 往 那里 去 ？ 我 也 不知 这里 是 何处 ， 望 乞 携带 携带 。 ”
English Translation: Observing delightedly that the lady was a fairy , Bao-yu hurried forward and saluted her with a smile . ' Madam Fairy , I do not know where you have come from or where you are going to , but as I am quite lost in this place , will you please take me with you and be my guide ? '

红楼梦原文: 那 仙姑 道 ： “ 吾 居 离恨 天 之上 ， 灌愁 海 之中 ， 乃放 春山 遣 香洞 太虚幻境 警幻 仙姑 是 也 。
English Translation: ' I am the fairy Disenchantment , ' the fairy woman replied . ' I live beyond the Realm of Separation , in the Sea of Sadness . There is a Mountain of Spring Awakening which rises from the midst of that sea , and on that mountain is the Paradise of the Full-blown Flower , and in that paradise is the Land of Illusion , which is my home .

红楼梦原文: 司 人间 之 风情月债 ， 掌 尘世 之 女怨 男痴 。
English Translation: My business is with the romantic passions , love-debts , girlish heartbreaks and male philanderings of your duststained , human world .

红楼梦原文: 因 近来 风流冤孽 ， 缠绵 于 此 ， 是 以前 来访 察 机会 ， 布散 相思 。
English Translation: The reason I have come here today is that recently there has been a heavy concentration of love-karma in this area , and I hope to be able to find an opportunity of distributing a quantity of amorous thoughts by implanting them in the appropriate breasts .

红楼梦原文: 今日 与 尔 相逢 ， 亦非 偶然 。
English Translation: My meeting you here today is no accident but a part of the same project .

红楼梦原文: 此 离 吾 境 不远 ， 别无他物 ， 仅 有 自 采仙茗 一盏 ， 亲酿 美酒 几 瓮 ， 素练魔舞 歌姬 数 人 ， 新 填 ‘ 红楼梦 ’ 仙曲 十二支 ， 可试 随 我一 游否 ？ ”
English Translation: ' This place where we are now is not so very far from my home . I have not much to offer you , but would you like to come back with me and let me try to entertain you ? I have some fairy tea , which I picked myself . You could have a cup of that . And I have a few jars of choice new wine of my own brewing . I have also been rehearsing a fairy choir and a troupe of fairy dancers in a twelve-part suite which I recently composed called " A Dream of Golden Days " . I could get them to perform it for you . What do you think ? '

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 听 了 ， 喜跃 非常 ， 便 忘 了 秦氏 在 何处 了 ， 竟 随着 这 仙姑 到 了 一个 所在 。
English Translation: Bao-yu was so excited by this invitation that he quite forgot to wonder what had become of Qin-shi in his eagerness to accompany the fairy .

红楼梦原文: 忽 见 前面 有 一座 石牌 横建 ， 上书 “ 太虚幻境 ” 四大 字 ， 两边 一副 对联 ， 乃是 ：
English Translation: As he followed her , a big stone archway suddenly loomed up in front of them on which THE LAND OF ILLUSION was written in large characters . A couplet in smaller characters was inscribed on either side of the arch :

红楼梦原文: 假作 真时 真 亦 假 ，
English Translation: Truth becomes fiction when the fiction 's true ;

红楼梦原文: 无为 有 处有 还 无 。
English Translation: Real becomes not-real when the unreal 's real .

红楼梦原文: 转过 牌坊 ， 便是 一座 宫门 ， 上面 横书 着 四个 大字 ， 道 是 ： “ 孽海 情天 ” 。 也 有 一副 对联 ， 大书云 ：
English Translation: Having negotiated the archway , they presently came to the gateway of a palace . The following words were inscribed horizontally above the lintel : SEAS OF PAIN AND SKIES OF PASSION whilst the following words were inscribed vertically on the two sides :

红楼梦原文: 厚 地 高 天 ，
English Translation: Ancient earth and sky

红楼梦原文: 堪叹 古今 情 不尽 ；
English Translation: Marvel that love 's passion should outlast all time .

红楼梦原文: 痴男怨女 ，
English Translation: Star-crossed men and maids

红楼梦原文: 可怜 风月 债难酬 。
English Translation: Groan that love 's debts should be so hard to pay .

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 看 了 ， 心下 自思道 ： “ 原来如此 。 但 不知 何为 ‘ 古今之 情 ’ ？
English Translation: ' I see , ' said Bao-yu to himself . ' I wonder what the meaning of " passion that outlasts all time " can be .

红楼梦原文: 又 何为 ‘ 风月 之 债 ’ ？
English Translation: And what are " love 's debts " ?

红楼梦原文: 从今 倒 要 领略 领略 。 ”
English Translation: From now on I must make an effort to understand these things . '

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 只顾 如此 一 想 ， 不料 早 把 些 邪魔 招入 膏肓 了 。
English Translation: He could not , of course , have known it , but merely by thinking this he had invited the attentions of the demon Lust , and at that very moment a little of the demon 's evil poison had entered Bao-yu is body and lodged itself in the innermost recesses of his heart .

红楼梦原文: 当下 随了 仙姑 进入 二层 门内 ， 只见 两边 配殿 ， 皆 有 匾额 对联 ， 一时 看 不尽 许多 ， 惟见 几处 写 着 的 是 ： “ 痴情 司 ” ， “ 结怨 司 ” ， “ 朝 啼司 ” ， “ 暮 哭司 ” ， “ 春 感司 ” ， “ 秋 悲司 ” 。
English Translation: Wholly unconscious of his mortal peril , Bao-yu continued to follow the fairy woman . They passed through a second gateway , and Bao-yu saw a range of palace buildings ahead of them on either hand . The entrance to each building had a board above it proclaiming its name , and there were couplets on either side of the doorways . Bao-yu did not have time to read all of the names , but he managed to make out a few , viz : DEPARTMENT OF FOND INFATUATION DEPARTMENT OF CRUEL REJECTION DEPARTMENT OF EARLY MORNING WEEPING DEPARTMENT OF LATE NIGHT SOBBING DEPARTMENT OF SPRING FEVER DEPARTMENT OF AUTUMN GRIEF

红楼梦原文: 看 了 ， 因向 仙姑 道 ： “ 敢 烦 仙姑 引 我 到 那 各 司 中 游玩 游玩 ， 不知 可 使得 么 ？ ”
English Translation: ' Madam Fairy , ' said Bao-yu , whose interest had been whetted by what he had managed to read , ' could not you take me inside these offices to have a look around ? '

红楼梦原文: 仙姑 道 ： “ 此中 各 司存 的 是 普天下 所有 的 女子 过去 未来 的 簿册 ， 尔乃凡 眼尘 躯 ， 未便 先知 的 。 ”
English Translation: ' In these offices , ' said the fairy woman , ' are kept registers in which are recorded the past , present and future of girls from all over the world . It is not permitted that your earthly eyes should look on things that are yet to come . '

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 听 了 ， 那里 肯舍 ， 又 再 四 的 恳求 。
English Translation: Bao-yu was most unwilling to accept this answer , and begged and pleaded so persistently that at last Disenchantment gave in .

红楼梦原文: 那 警幻 便 说 ： “ 也罢 ， 就 在 此 司内略 随喜 随喜 罢 。 ”
English Translation: ' Very well . You may make a very brief inspection of this office here . '

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 喜不自胜 ， 抬头 看 这 司 的 匾 上 ， 乃是 “ 薄命 司 ” 三 字 ， 两边 写 着 对联 道 ：
English Translation: Delighted beyond measure , Bao-yu raised his head and read the notice above the doorway : DEPARTMENT OF THE ILL-FATED FAIR The couplet inscribed vertically on either side of the doorway was as follows :

红楼梦原文: 春 恨 秋悲皆自惹 ，
English Translation: Spring griefs and autumn sorrows were by yourselves provoked .

红楼梦原文: 花容月貌 为 谁 妍 。
English Translation: Flower faces , moonlike beauty were to what end disclosed ?

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 看 了 ， 便 知 感叹 。
English Translation: Bao-yu grasped enough of the meaning to be affected by its melancholy .

红楼梦原文: 进入 门中 ， 只见 有 十数个 大橱 ， 皆 用 封条 封着 。 看 那 封条 上 ， 皆 有 各省 字样 。
English Translation: Passing inside , he saw a dozen or more large cupboards with paper strips pasted on their doors on which were written the names of different provinces .

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 一心 只 拣 自己 家乡 的 封条 看 ， 只见 那边 橱 上 封条 大 书 “ 金陵 十二钗 正册 ” ， 宝玉 因 问 ： “ 何为 ‘ 金陵 十二钗 正册 ’ ？ ” 警幻 道 ： “ 即尔省 中 十二 冠首 女子 之 册 ， 故 为 正册 。 ”
English Translation: He was careful to look out for the one belonging to his own area and presently found one on which the paper strip said ' Jinling , Twelve Beauties of , Main Register ' . Bao-yu asked Disenchantment what this meant , and she explained that it was a register of the twelve most outstanding girls of his home province .

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 道 ： “ 常 听 人 说 ， 金陵 极大 ， 怎么 只 十二个 女子 ？
English Translation: ' People all say what a big place Jinling is , ' said Bao-yu . ' Surely there should be more than just twelve names ?

红楼梦原文: 如今 单 我们 家里 ， 上上下下 就 有 几百个 女孩儿 。 ”
English Translation: Why , even in my own home , if you count the servants , there must be altogether several hundred girls . '

红楼梦原文: 警幻 微笑 道 ： “ 一 省 女子 固多 ， 不过 择 其 紧要 者 录 之 ， 两边 二 橱则 又 次之 。
English Translation: ' Certainly there are a great many girls in the whole province , ' said Disenchantment with a smile , ' but only the most important ones have been selected for recording in this register . The registers in the cupboards on either side contain two other selections from the same area .

红楼梦原文: 一 余者 庸常 之辈 便 无册 可录 了 。 ”
English Translation: But of the host of ordinary girls outside those three dozen we keep no records .

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 再 看 下首 一 橱 ， 上 写 着 “ 金陵 十二钗 副 册 ” ， 又 一 橱 上 写 着 “ 金陵 十二钗 又 副 册 ” 。
English Translation: Bao-yu glanced at the other two cupboards referred to by Disenchantment . One was labelled Jinling , Twelve Beauties of , Supplementary Register No.1 ' ; the other was labelled Jinling , Twelve Beauties of , Supplementary Register No.2 ' .

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 便 伸手 先 将 “ 又 副 册 ” 橱门 开 了 ， 拿出 一本 册来 ， 揭开 看 时 ， 只见 这 首页 上画 的 ， 既 非 人物 ， 亦非 山水 ， 不过 是 水墨 滃 染 ， 满纸 乌云 浊雾 而已 。 后 有 几行 字迹 ， 写道 是 ：
English Translation: Stretching out his hand he opened the door of the second one , took out Supplementary Register No.2 , which was like a large album , and opened it at the first page . It was a picture , but not of a person or a view . The whole page was covered with dark ink washes representing storm-clouds or fog , followed on the next page by a few lines of verse :

红楼梦原文: 霁月 难逢 ，
English Translation: Seldom the moon shines in a cloudless sky ,

红楼梦原文: 彩云易散 。
English Translation: And days of brightness all too soon pass by .

红楼梦原文: 心比天高 ，
English Translation: A noble and aspiring mind

红楼梦原文: 身为 下贱 。
English Translation: In a base-born frame confined ,

红楼梦原文: 风流 灵巧 招人 怨 。
English Translation: Your charm and wit did only hatred gain ,

红楼梦原文: 寿天多 因 诽谤 生 ，
English Translation: And in the end you were by slanders slain ,

红楼梦原文: 多情 公子 空 牵念 。
English Translation: Your gentle lord 's solicitude 1 vain .

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 看 了 不 甚 明白 。
English Translation: Bao-yu could not make much sense of this , and turned to the next page .

红楼梦原文: 又 见 后面 画 着 一簇 鲜花 ， 一床 破席 ， 也 有 几句 言词 ， 写道 是 ：
English Translation: It was another picture , this time of a bunch of fresh flowers and a worn-out mat , again followed by a few lines of verse .

红楼梦原文: 枉自 温柔 和顺 ，
English Translation: What price your kindness and compliance ,

红楼梦原文: 空云 似 桂如兰 ；
English Translation: Of sweetest flower the rich perfume ?

红楼梦原文: 堪羡 优伶 有 福 ，
English Translation: You chose the player fortune favoured ,

红楼梦原文: 谁知 公子 无缘 。
English Translation: Unmindful of your master 's doom .

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 看 了 ， 益发 解说 不出 是 何 意思 ， 遂 将 这 一本 册子 搁起来 ， 又 去 开 了 “ 副 册 ” 橱门 。 拿 起 一本 册来 ， 打开 看 时 ， 只见 首页 也 是 画 ， 却 画 着 一枝 桂花 ， 下面 有 一方 池沼 ， 其中 水涸 泥干 ， 莲 枯 藕 败 ， 后面 书云 ：
English Translation: Bao-yu was even more mystified by this than by the first page , and laying the album aside , opened the door of the cupboard marked ' Supplementary Register No.1 ' and took out the album from that . As in the previous album , the first page was a picture . It represented a branch of cassia with a pool underneath . The water in the pool had dried up and the mud in the bottom was dry and cracked . Growing from it was a withered and broken lotus plant . The picture was followed by these lines :

红楼梦原文: 根 并 荷花 一 茎 香 ，
English Translation: Your stem grew from a noble lotus root ,

红楼梦原文: 平生 遭际 实堪 伤 ；
English Translation: Yet your life passed , poor flower , in low repute .

红楼梦原文: 自从 两地 生孤木 ，
English Translation: The day two earths shall bear a single tree ,

红楼梦原文: 致使 香魂 返 故乡 。
English Translation: Your soul must fly home to its own country .

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 看 了 又 不解 。 又 去取 那 “ 正册 ” 看 时 ， 只见 头 一页 上 画 着 是 两株 枯木 ， 木 上 悬 着 一围 玉带 ； 地下 又 有 一堆 雪 ， 雪 中 一股 金簪 。 也 有 四句 诗道 ：
English Translation: Once more failing to make any sense of what he saw , Bao-yu picked up the Main Register to look at . In this album the picture on the first page represented two dead trees with a jade belt hanging in their branches and on the ground beneath them a pile of snow in which a golden hairpin lay half-buried . This was followed by a quatrain :

红楼梦原文: 可叹 停机 德 ，
English Translation: One was a pattern of female virtue ,

红楼梦原文: 堪怜 咏絮 才 ！
English Translation: One a wit who made other wits seem slow .

红楼梦原文: 玉带 林中 挂 ，
English Translation: The jade belt in the greenwood hangs ,

红楼梦原文: 金簪 雪 里 埋 。
English Translation: The gold pin is buried beneath the snow .

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 看 了 仍 不解 ， 待 要 问 时 ， 知 他 必 不肯 泄漏天机 ；
English Translation: Still Bao-yu was unable to understand the meaning . He would have liked to ask , but he knew that Disenchantment would be unwilling to divulge the secrets of her immortal world .

红楼梦原文: 待 要 丢下 ， 又 不 舍 ， 遂 往后 看 。
English Translation: Yet though he could make no sense of the book , for some reason he found himself unable this time to lay it down , and continued to look through it to the end .

红楼梦原文: 只见 画 着 一张 弓 ， 弓 上 挂 着 一个 香 橡 。 也 有 一首歌 词云 ：
English Translation: The picture that followed was of a bow with a citron hanging from it , followed by what looked like the words of a song :

红楼梦原文: 二十年 来辨 是非 ，
English Translation: You shall , when twenty years in life 's hard school are done ,

红楼梦原文: 榴花 开处 照 宫闱 ；
English Translation: In pomegranate-time to palace halls ascend .

红楼梦原文: 三春争 及 初 春景 ，
English Translation: Though three springs never could with your first spring compare ,

红楼梦原文: 虎 兔 相逢 大 梦 归 。
English Translation: When hare meets tiger your great dream shall end .

红楼梦原文: 后面 又 画 着 两个 人 放风筝 ， 一片 大海 ， 一只 大船 ， 船中 有 一 女子 ， 掩面 泣涕 之 状 。
English Translation: Next was a picture of two people flying a kite . There was also a large expanse of sea with a boat in it and a girl in the boat who had buried her face in her hands and appeared to be crying .

红楼梦原文: 画 后 也 有 四句 写 着 道 ：
English Translation: This was followed by a quatrain :

红楼梦原文: 才 自 清明 志自高 ，
English Translation: Blessed with a shrewd mind and a noble heart ,

红楼梦原文: 生于 末世 运 偏 消 ；
English Translation: Yet born in time of twilight and decay ,

红楼梦原文: 清明 涕泣 江边 望 ，
English Translation: In spring through tears at river 's bank you gaze ,

红楼梦原文: 千里 东风 一梦 遥 。
English Translation: Borne by the wind a thousand miles away .

红楼梦原文: 后面 又 画 着 几缕 飞云 ， 一 湾 逝水 。 其 词曰 ：
English Translation: The next picture showed some scudding wisps of cloud and a stretch of running water followed by these words :

红楼梦原文: 富贵 又 何为 ？
English Translation: What shall avail you rank and riches ,

红楼梦原文: 襁褓 之间 父母 违 ；
English Translation: Orphaned while yet in swaddling bands you lay ?

红楼梦原文: 展眼 吊斜 辉 ，
English Translation: Soon you must mourn your bright sun 's early setting .

红楼梦原文: 湘江 水 逝 楚云飞 。
English Translation: The Xiang flows and the Chu clouds sail away .

红楼梦原文: 后面 又 画 着 一块 美玉 落 在 泥污 之中 。 其 断语 云 ：
English Translation: Next was a picture showing a beautiful jade which had fallen into the mud , followed by words of judgement :

红楼梦原文: 欲洁 何曾洁 ，
English Translation: For all your would-be spotlessness

红楼梦原文: 云空 未必 空 ；
English Translation: And vaunted otherworldliness ,

红楼梦原文: 可怜 金玉 质 ，
English Translation: You that look down on common flesh and blood ,

红楼梦原文: 终 陷 淖 泥 中 。
English Translation: Yourself ' impure , shall end up in the mud .

红楼梦原文: 后面 忽 画 一 恶狼 ， 追扑 一 美女 — — 欲 啖 之 意 。
English Translation: Next was a striking picture of a savage wolf pursuing a beautiful girl . He had just seized her with his jaws and appeared to be about to eat her .

红楼梦原文: 其 下书 云 :
English Translation: Underneath it was written :

红楼梦原文: 子系 中山狼 ，
English Translation: Paired with a brute like the wolf in the old fable ,

红楼梦原文: 得志 便 猖狂 ；
English Translation: Who on his saviour turned when he was able ,

红楼梦原文: 金 闺 花柳 质 ，
English Translation: To cruelty not used , your gentle heart

红楼梦原文: 一载 赴 黄粱 。
English Translation: Shall , in a twelvemonth only , break apart .

红楼梦原文: 后面 便是 一所 古庙 ， 里面 有 一美人 ， 在内 看 经 独坐 。
English Translation: After this was an old temple with a beautiful girl sitting all on her own inside it reading a Buddhist siitra .

红楼梦原文: 其 判 云 ：
English Translation: The words said :

English Translation: What is the use of all this luxury and splendour , she said bitterly , ' if I am to be always separated from those I love - denied the tenderness which even the poorest peasant who seasons his bread with salt and pickles and dresses in hempen homespun is free to enjoy ? '

红楼梦原文: 贾政亦 含泪 启道 ： “ 臣 草芥 寒门 ， 鸠 群鸦 属 之中 ， 岂意 得征 凤鸾 之 瑞 。
English Translation: With tears in his eyes the good man delivered the following little speech to the daughter he could not see :

红楼梦原文: 今 贵人 上锡 天恩 ， 下 昭 祖德 ， 此 皆 山川 日月 之 精华 ， 祖宗 之 远 德 ， 钟 于 一 人 ， 幸及 政 夫妇 。
English Translation: ' Madam . That a poor and undistinguished household such as ours should have produced , as it were , a phoenix from amidst a flock of crows and pies to bask in the sunshine of Imperial favour and shed its reflected beams on the departed representatives of our ancestral line must be attributable to the concentration in your single person of the quintessences of all that is most admirable in celestial and terrestrial nature and the accumulated merit of many generations of our forebears , and is an honour and a blessing in which my wife and I are proud to be participators .

红楼梦原文: 且 今 上体 天地生 生之 大德 ， 垂 古今 未有 之 旷恩 ， 虽 肝脑涂地 ， 岂能 报效万一 ！ 惟 朝乾夕惕 ， 忠于 厥 职 。
English Translation: Our beloved Emperor , who embodies in his own Sacred Person those life-giving forces which are always invisibly at work in the natural cosmos , has showered down upon his grateful subjects a gracious kindness unprecedented in the annals of recorded history - a kindness which even the expenditure of our life 's blood to the veriest ultimate drop would be wholly inadequate to repay and which only the most unremitting pains and unswerving loyalty in the discharge of those duties to which it has pleased him to call us could adequately express .

红楼梦原文: 伏 愿 圣君 万岁千秋 ， 乃 天下 苍生之 福 也 。 贵妃 切勿 以 政 夫妇 残年 为 念 。 更 祈自 加 珍爱 ， 惟 勤慎 肃恭 以 侍 上 ， 庶 不负 上 眷顾 隆恩 也 。 ”
English Translation: It is our earnest prayer that His Sacred Majesty may continue long to reign over us , a blessing to all his peoples ; and that Your Grace should feel no anxiety concerning the welfare of my wife and myself during our now declining years , but should rather cherish and sustain your own precious person , in order to be the better able to serve His Sacred Majesty with care and diligence , seeking by that service to be worthy of the tender regard and loving favour which he has been graciously pleased to bestow upon you . '

'

红楼梦原文: 宝钗笑 道 ： “ 你 只 把 ‘ 绿玉 ’ 的 ‘ 玉 ’ 字 改作 ‘ 蜡 ’ 字 就是 了 。 ”
English Translation: Why do not you put " in spring green waxen sheaths " in place of your " sheathed skirts of lucent green " ?

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 道 ： “ ‘ 绿蜡 ’ 可 有 出处 ？ ”
English Translation: ' Where do you get " green waxen " from ? ' said Bao-yu .

红楼梦原文: 宝钗 悄悄的 咂嘴 点头 笑 道 ： “ 亏 你 今夜 不过如此 ， 将来 金殿 对策 ， 你 大约 连 ‘ 赵钱孙 李 ’ 都 忘 了 呢 ！
English Translation: ' Tut , tut , tut ! ' Bao-chai shook her head pityingly . ' If this is what you are like tonight , Heaven knows what you will be like in a few years ' time when you come to take the Palace Examination . Probably you will find you have forgotten even the Child 's First Primer of Rhyming Names .

红楼梦原文: — — 唐朝 ｛ 钱 珝 ｝ 咏 芭蕉 诗头 一句 ： ‘ 冷烛 无烟 绿 蜡 干 ’ 都 忘 了 么 ？ ”
English Translation: It is from the Tang poet Qian Xu 's poem " Furled Plantains " : Green waxen candles from which no fames rise . Do you mean to say you have forgotten that ? '

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 听 了 ， 不觉 洞开 心意 ， 笑 道 ： “ 该死 ， 该死 ！
English Translation: The scales fell from Bao-yu 's eyes . ' Good gracious , how stupid of me !

红楼梦原文: 眼前 现成 的 句子 竟 想不到 。
English Translation: The words are there ready-made and I did not think of them !

红楼梦原文: 姐姐 真是 ‘ 一字师 ’ 了 ！
English Translation: I shall have to call you my " One Word Teacher " , like the poet in the story ! '

红楼梦原文: 从此 只 叫 你 师傅 ， 再 不 叫 姐姐 了 。 ”
English Translation: I shall not be able to treat you like a sister any more , I shall have to say " sir " when I speak to you ! '

红楼梦原文: 宝钗 也 悄悄的 笑 道 ： “ 还 不快 做 上去 ， 只 姐姐 妹妹 的 ！
English Translation: ' Sister ! ' said Bao-chai with a little laugh . ' Stop fooling about and get on with your poem !

红楼梦原文: 谁 是 你 姐姐 ？ 那 上头 穿 黄袍 的 才 是 你 姐姐 呢 。 ”
English Translation: That is your sister , sitting up there in the golden robe . I am no sister of yours ! '

红楼梦原文: 一面 说 笑 ， 因怕 他 耽延 工夫 ， 遂 抽身 走开 了 。
English Translation: Fearing that he would waste more time if she stayed , she slipped quietly away .

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 续成 了 此 首 ， 共有 三首 。
English Translation: The poem finished , Bao-yu had now completed three out of the four commanded .

红楼梦原文: 此时 黛玉 未 得展 才 ， 心上 不快 。
English Translation: At this point Dai-yu , who was still full of dissatisfaction because her talent had been underemployed , noticed that Bao-yu was struggling and came over to the table at which he was working .

红楼梦原文: 因见 宝玉 构思 太苦 ， 走 至 案 旁 ， 知 宝玉 只少 “ 杏帘 在 望 ” 一首 ， 因 叫 他 抄录 前 三首 ， 却 自己 吟成 一律 ， 写 在 纸条 上 ， 搓成 个 团子 ， 掷 向宝玉 跟前 。
English Translation: Observing that ' The Hopeful Sign ' still remained to be done , she told him to get on with the copying out in fair of the three poems he had already completed while she thought of something for ' The Hopeful Sign ' . When she had completed a poem in her head , she scribbled it out on a piece of paper , screwed it into a little ball , and tossed it in front of him .

红楼梦原文: 宝玉 打开 一 看 ， 觉比 自己 做 的 三首 高 得 十倍 ， 遂 忙 恭 楷 誊 完 呈 上 。
English Translation: Bao-yu smoothed it out on the table and read it through . It seemed to him to be ten times better than the ones he had written himself . He copied it out in neat kai-shu after the other three and handed the finished task to Yuan-chun for her inspection .

English Translation: The House of Green Delights

English Translation: Some carmine caps , that are not doffed at night .

English Translation: The Hopeful Sign

English Translation: The garden 's chives are ready to prepare ;

English Translation: When want is banished , as in times like these ,

English Translation: The spinner and the ploughman take their ease .

红楼梦原文: 元妃 看毕 ， 喜之 不尽 ， 说 ： “ 果然 进益 了 ！ ”
English Translation: Yuan-chun was genuinely delighted . ' You really have made progress ! ' she said .

红楼梦原文: 又 指 “ 杏帘 ” 一首 为 四首 之 冠 ， 遂 将 “ 浣 葛 山庄 ” 改为 “ 稻香村 ” 。
English Translation: She singled out ' The Hopeful Sign ' as the best of the four and changed the name Washbrook Farm ' back to ' Sweet-rice Village ' by way of acknowledgement .

红楼梦原文: 又 命 探春 将 方才 十数 首诗 ， 另以 锦笺 誉出 ， 令 太监 传 与 外厢 。
English Translation: She made Tan-chun copy all ten poems - Bao-yu 's and the girls ' - on to a sheet of fancy paper and sent a eunuch to show it to the gentlemen outside .

红楼梦原文: 贾政 等 看 了 ， 都 称颂 不已 。 贾政又 进 《 归省 颂 》 。
English Translation: Jia Zheng and the others were very complimentary , and Jia Zheng presented a eulogy of his own composition entitled The Visitation .

红楼梦原文: 元妃 又 命以 琼 酪金 脍 等 物 ， 赐与 宝玉 并 贾兰 。
English Translation: Yuan-chun also ordered Bao-yu and Jia Lan to be given presents of junket and mince , both of some special kind only made in the Imperial kitchens .

红楼梦原文: — — 此时 贾兰 尚幼 ， 未谙 诸事 ， 只不过 随 母依叔 行礼 而已 。
English Translation: At this period Jia Lan was still only a very little boy and did not really know what was going on . He was taken by his mother Li Wan into Yuan-chun 's presence and stood beside his uncle Bao-yu to make his little bow of thanks .

红楼梦原文: 那时 贾蔷 带领 一班 女 戏子 在 楼下 ， 正 等得 不耐烦 ， 只见 一个 太监 飞跑 下来 ， 说 ： “ 做 完 了 诗 了 ， 快 拿 戏单 来 ！ ”
English Translation: All this time Jia Qiang and his troupe of girl players had been waiting impatiently below for an order to begin their performance . Just as they were reaching a peak of impatience , a eunuch came running down to them . ' They have finished writing poems , ' he said . ' Quick , give me a play-bill ! '

红楼梦原文: 贾蔷忙 将 戏目 呈 上 ， — — 并 十二个 人 的 花名册 子 。
English Translation: Jia Qiang hurriedly handed him a list of the pieces they had rehearsed , together with a brochure containing the stage names of each of the twelve players and some notes on the parts which each of them played .

红楼梦原文: 少时 ， 点 了 四出戏 ： 第一 出 ， 《 豪宴 》 ； 第二 出 ， 《 乞巧 》 ； 第三 出 ， 《 仙缘 》 ， 第四 出 ， 《 离魂 》 。
English Translation: Four pieces were chosen : ' Shi-fan Entertains ' from The Handful of Snou , ' The Double Seventh ' from The Palace of Eternal Youth , ' The Meeting of the Immortals ' from The Han-dan Road and ' Li-niang 's death-scene ' from The Return of the Soul .

红楼梦原文: 贾蔷忙 张罗 扮演 起来 ， 一个个 歌有 裂石 之 音 ， 舞 有 天魔 之 态 ， 虽是 妆演 的 形容 ， 却 做 尽 悲欢 的 情状 。
English Translation: Jia Qiang supervised the preparations , and soon the rock-splitting little voices and spellbinding movements of the actresses had taken over , and the stage was full of passions which were no whit less overwhelming for being counterfeit .

红楼梦原文: 刚 演完 了 ， 一个 太监 托 着 一 金盘 糕点 之 属 进来 ， 问 ： “ 谁 是 龄 官 ？ ”
English Translation: No sooner had they finished than a eunuch came round , bearing a variety of fancy cakes and sweetmeats on a gilded salver . ' Which is " Charmante " ? ' he asked , referring to the stage name of the little soubrette who had played the part of Li-niang 's maid in The Return of the Soul and a dashing young huntsman in the play within a play in The Handful of Snow .

红楼梦原文: 贾蔷便 知 是 赐 龄 官 之 物 ， 连忙 接 了 ， 命龄 官 叩头 。
English Translation: Jia Qiang realized that the confectionery was a present for the little actress , and taking the salver from the eunuch , made Mademoiselle Charmante come forward and kotow her thanks .

红楼梦原文: 太监 又 道 ： “ 贵妃 有 谕 ， 说 ： ‘ 龄 官 极好 ， 再 做 两出 戏 ， 不拘 那 两出 就是 了 。 ’ ”
English Translation: ' Her Grace says that she enjoyed Mademoiselle Charmante 's performance the most and would like to see her in two more pieces , ' said the eunuch . ' She may choose any two she likes . '

红楼梦原文: 贾蔷忙 答应 了 ， 因 命龄 官 做 《 游园 》 《 惊梦 》 二 出 。
English Translation: Having replied to the eunuch , Jia Qiang told Charmante that she ought to play two more pieces from The Return gf the Soul : The Walk in the Garden ' and ' The Dream ' .

红楼梦原文: 龄 官 自 为此 二 出非 本角 之 戏 ， 执意不从 ， 定要 做 《 相约 》 《 相骂 》 二 出 。
English Translation: But neither had a part suitable for a soubrette in it , and Charmante obdurately refused . She said she would do ' The Assignation ' and ' The Altercation ' from The Bracelet and the Comb , in which the part of the pert young maidservant would allow her comic talent a fuller scope .

红楼梦原文: 贾蔷扭 不过 他 ， 只得 依 他 做 了 。
English Translation: Jia Qiang failed to talk her out of this decision and had to let her do as she wished .

红楼梦原文: 元妃 甚 喜 ， 命 ： “ 莫难 为了 这 女孩子 ， 好生 教习 。 ”
English Translation: Yuan-chun was delighted , and gave special instructions that Charmante was to be well treated and to have the best possible training .

红楼梦原文: 额外 赏 了 两匹 宫绸 ， 两个 荷包 ， 并 金 银锞子 之类 。
English Translation: She also awarded her , over and above her share of the presents that the whole troupe would receive in commemoration of her visit , two dress-lengths of tribute satin , two embroidered purses , and some miniature gold and silver ingots .

红楼梦原文: 然后 撤 筵 ， 将 未 到 之处 ， 复 又 游玩 。
English Translation: The feast was now cleared away and Yuan-chun recommenced her tour of the garden , visiting those places which she had not had time to look at before dinner .

红楼梦原文: 忽 见 山环 佛寺 ， 忙 盥手 进去 焚香 拜佛 ， 又题 一 匾 云 ： “ 苦 海慈航 ” ； 又 额外 加恩 与 一班 幽尼 女道 。
English Translation: When they came to the little convent nestling under its hill , she washed her hands and entered the shrine-hall to offer incense and pray before the image of the Buddha . She also wrote an inscription for the board which hung above the image : THE SHIP OF MERCY ON THE SEA OF SUFFERING and gave instructions for various extra presents to be bestowed on the little nuns in addition to those which , along with all the other members of the household , they were already due to receive in commemoration of her visit .

红楼梦原文: 少时 ， 太监 跪启 ： “ 赐 物 俱 齐 ， 请验 按 例行 赏 。 ” 乃 呈 上 略 节 。
English Translation: A list for the latter had already been drawn up and presently it was submitted to Yuan-chun by a kneeling eunuch for her approval .

English Translation: There were also a hundred bales of variegated satins , a thousand taels of silver and an unspecified number of bottles of Palace wine for the senior servants of the Rong and Ning Mansions and Separate Residence responsible for construction and maintenance , attendance , theatre management , and lighting , and an additional five hundred strings of unmixed Imperial Mint copper cash for the cooks , entertainers and Miscellaneous .

红楼梦原文: 众人 谢恩 已 毕 ， 执事 太监 启道 ： “ 时 已 丑 正 三刻 ， 请 驾 回銮 。 ”
English Translation: When all had expressed their thanks , one of the eunuchs in charge announced that it was a quarter to three and time for Her Grace to return to the Palace .

红楼梦原文: 元妃 不由 的 满眼 又 滴下 泪 来 ， 却 又 勉强 笑 着 ， 拉 了 贾母王 夫人 的 手 不忍 放 ， 再 四 叮咛 ： “ 不须 记挂 ， 好生 保养 ！
English Translation: At once Yuan-chun 's eyes filled with tears , and even though she forced herself to smile , she was unable to prevent a few drops from falling . Clinging to Grandmother Jia and Lady Wang as if she would never let them go , she begged them again and again not to grieve for her . ' Now you must not worry about me , my dears : just look after yourselves !

红楼梦原文: 如今 天恩 浩荡 ， 一月 许进 内 省视 一次 ， 见面 尽 容易 的 ， 何必 过 悲 ？
English Translation: Thanks to the Emperor 's kindness , we are now allowed visits in the Palace once a month : so you see we can see each other quite easily . It is silly of us to be so upset !

红楼梦原文: 倘 明岁 天恩 仍许 归省 ， 不可 如此 奢华 糜费 了 。 ”
English Translation: And if His Majesty is gracious enough to permit another Visitation next year , you really must not be so extravagant again on my account ! '

红楼梦原文: 贾母 等 已 哭 的 哽噎 难言 。
